segments.text: I see the boy standing on that stool, and it's making me really nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second, and he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's being really reckless, stretching his body like that to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He has one hand in the jar and the other holding a plate, like he's trying to catch falling cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching an accident waiting to happen, and there's nothing I can do about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is wet and slippery, which makes the situation even more dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he realizes how precarious his position is and climbs down carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, not caring about the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're both going to get into trouble if their mom catches them like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how unaware everyone is of the hazards in this room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself, but it's looking more and more likely.
segments.speaker: PAR
